name: The Best Iced Tea (Cold-Brewed Iced Tea)
description: Cold-brewed iced tea is naturally sweet, clean-tasting, and refreshing.
recipeIngredient: 4 tea bags, or 1 tablespoon (8 to 10g) loose tea

recipeInstructions.text: Add water and tea bags or loose tea to a resealable container. Seal and refrigerate 5 hours (see note).
Remove tea bags (or strain with a fine-mesh strainer to remove loose tea). Serve over ice.
